short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jclock is a beautiful and convenient alarm clock.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
=Jclock v1.0=

Jclock is a convenient alarm clock designed specifically for busy professionals and is simple to use.

When you're focused on working at your computer, it's easy to lose track of time. Jclock provides timely reminders to ensure you never miss an important event.

With a clean and beautiful interface, Jclock helps you manage your time efficiently while seamlessly delivering notifications, allowing you to stay focused on your tasks. Additionally, you can customize the alarm to turn it on or off according to your needs.

Key Features:

Minimalistic and intuitive design, easy to operate.
Seamless integration with your desktop workflow.
Perfect for tracking meetings, appointments, and important deadlines.
Supports customizable alarm on/off settings for flexible reminders.
Stay organized and on time with Jclock!
